TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ElementHost extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("WindowsFormsIntegration.Design.ElementHostCodeDomSerializer, WindowsFormsIntegration.Design, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

span.span: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use la control se coloque un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] en su [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control o formulario.Use the control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form. Para hospedar un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controlar en un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, use el elemento.To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the element. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration.dll se instala con el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ensamblados.WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. La ubicación predeterminada para el ensamblado es %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. Para hospedar un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento en un formulario de Windows, debe asignar el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento a la propiedad.To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the property. Use la propiedad para asignar las asignaciones personalizadas entre un control y su hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.Use the property to assign custom mappings between an control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo usar el control para hospedar un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: hospedar un Control compuesto 3D de WPF en Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

member this.BackColorTransparent : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.

value.span: Si el elemento hospedado tiene un fondo transparente; en caso contrario, .

span.span: if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks El propiedad permite la copia de mapa de bits, que permite que hospeda elementos para utilizar la transparencia sobre el contenedor del host.The property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container. Esto es útil cuando el elemento es a través de una imagen o un fondo degradado.This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background. Por motivos de rendimiento, la propiedad está desactivada de forma predeterminada.For performance reasons, the property is turned off by default.

summary.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted by the control.
The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se puede hospedar un solo elemento, pero puede tener cualquier número de elementos secundarios.Only one element can be hosted, but can have any number of child elements. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo usar el propiedad para asignar un hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: hospedar un Control compuesto 3D de WPF en Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md). [!code-csharp[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/CSharp/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingWpfUserControlInWf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWpfUserControlInWf/VisualBasic/WpfUserControlHost/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources used by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método se llama por el público `Dispose` método y el método.This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` invoca el protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro establecido en `true`.`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. invoca `Dispose` con `disposing` establecido en `false`. invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. Cuando el parámetro `disposing` es `true`, este método libera todos los recursos retenidos por los objetos administrados a los que el control hace referencia.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. Este método invoca al método `Dispose` de cada uno de los objetos a los que se hace referencia.This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: puede llamarse varias veces por otros objetos. Cuando se reemplaza tenga cuidado de no hacer referencia a objetos que se hayan eliminado en una llamada anterior a . Para obtener más información sobre cómo implementar , vea [implementar un Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md) Dispose. Para obtener más información acerca de y , consulte [limpieza de Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) no administrado y [reemplazando el método Finalize] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableModelessKeyboardInterop(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

param.name: window
param.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.

summary.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

span.span: Enables a to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks Llame a la método reenviar todos los mensajes de teclado cuando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ventana se abre de forma no modal.Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly. El método instala un filtro de mensajes en el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-aplicación basada en.The method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application. El filtro reenvía todos los mensajes de teclado cuando la ventana no modal está activa.The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostContainer As Panel
public: property System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ HostContainer { System::Windows::Controls::Panel ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

span.span: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
The parent container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El contenedor host es el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , que es el contenedor primario para el elemento hospedado.The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , which is the parent container for the hosted element. El contenedor del host está siempre en la raíz de la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] jerarquía de elementos.The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy. Para tener acceso el elemento primario del elemento hospedado, tener acceso a directamente.To access the parent of the hosted element, access directly.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se genera un evento, se invoca el controlador de eventos a través de un delegado.Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. Para obtener más información, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). El método también permite que las clases derivadas controlen el evento sin adjuntar ningún delegado.The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. Ésta es la técnica preferida para controlar el evento en una clase derivada.This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: Cuando se reemplaza en una clase derivada, asegúrese de llamar a la clase base método para que los delegados registrados reciban el evento.
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPaint(class System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnPaint (e As PaintEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: A that contains the event data.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Raises the event.

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El implementación de la método reenvía a la implementación de la clase base.The implementation of the method forwards to the base class implementation.

span.para: No se invalidan esta implementación de la método. El control administra la pintura de su elemento hospedado y reemplazo causará resultados impredecibles.
Do not override this implementation of the method. The control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding will cause unpredictable results.

summary.span: Paints the background of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método pinta el fondo del control primario en un HBITMAP fuera de la pantalla.The method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP. Este mapa de bits se utiliza como fondo en el elemento hospedado para admitir la transparencia.This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency. Este método es compatible con la infraestructura de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] y no está diseñado para utilizarse directamente desde el código.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

param.name: keyData
param.span: One of the values representing the key to process.

summary.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

span.span: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.

returns.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

span.span: if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si un mensaje de tecla no se controla por hospedado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, éste se reenvía a la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] jerarquía para el procesamiento de clases.If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: Un código de confianza parcial no puede utilizar este miembro.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

span.span: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

value.span: Un que asigna a las propiedades de hospedado [! Elemento include[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-WinClient-MD.MD)].

span.span: A that maps to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologías, hay dos modelos de propiedades similares pero diferentes.The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models. *Asignación de propiedad* admite la interoperabilidad entre las dos arquitecturas.*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. Para más información, vea [Asignación de propiedades en formularios Windows Forms y WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo usar el propiedad para traducir el propiedad hospedados [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to translate the property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element. Para obtener más información, consulte [Tutorial: asignar propiedades mediante el uso del ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md).For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md). [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithElementHost#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithElementHost/Form1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Select (bool directed, bool forward);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Select(bool directed, bool forward) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Select (directed As Boolean, forward As Boolean)
protected: override void Select(bool directed, bool forward);

param.name: directed
param.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

span.span: to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, .

param.name: forward
param.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

span.span: to move forward in the tab order; to move backward in the tab order.

summary.span: Activates the hosted element.

span.span: Activates the hosted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El método activa el elemento hospedado.The method activates the hosted element. Si existe más de un elemento hospedado, se activa el elemento primero o último, según la `directed` y `forward` parámetros.If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters. Las llamadas repetidas a la método no atraviesan los elementos hospedados.Repeated calls to the method do not traverse the hosted elements. Para seleccionar los elementos subsiguientes, llame a la método en el propiedad.To select subsequent elements, call the method on the property. Esta implementación reenvía las teclas tab de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
